scripts.start:dev-unix: export DOCUMENTIA_ENV=DEV && echo Current environment for application is $DOCUMENTIA_ENV && next dev --port 3001
scripts.start:prod-unix: export DOCUMENTIA_ENV=PROD && echo Current environment for application is $DOCUMENTIA_ENV && next build && pm2 start main.server.js
scripts.start:prod-windows: set DOCUMENTIA_ENV=PROD && next build && pm2 start main.server.js
